name: Fall of Gorithia - Nym's Fate
description:
Fall of Gorithia - Nym's Fate is an action adventure sidescroller with RPG-elements. You are Nym, a thief that has been exiled to the mysterious kingdom of Gorithia.

Explore, learn and fight your way through the lands to find out the dark secret that caused the Fall of Gorithia. You start off simple with nothing but your sword - but as you progress you will unlock new abilities and powers to be able to defeat the mighty and horrible foes that come your way. 

Alongside a variety of different enemies you will also face difficult platform-challenges, fearsome bosses and of course - lots of interesting characters.

We really hope you will enjoy the game and would love if you'd join us on this journey! You're more than welcome to join our Discord server for every update in the production process. You will be able to get early access to both patches and information, and in the future you may even be rewarded!

https://discord.gg/u5jy9qMMQU
